EmailTemplate.name: User Deactivation Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Salesforce {!$Label.Environment_Name} – Deactivate Salesforce User
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
Your Salesforce user in {!$Label.Environment_Name} will be deactivated in 10 working days (14 calendar days).
If you want to continue using Salesforce and have access to this environment, please raise a ticket through the PET Front Door Platform Front Door - Overview (visualstudio.com). For any further queries, please contact the Platform Sustainability & Services’ Support Team (DLPS&S_Platform_support@health.gov.au).
Thank you,
Platform Sustainability & Services Team
Department of Health and Aged Care
